maqras.text: Ja swear positions stars
This bol oath ona len zauzlit ze bol awesome
This bol honorable Quran
Do chranit rezervovat si
Ziaden chapat it except the sincere
revelation z Lord universe
Ona disregarding this narration
Ona robit it tvoj zalezitost ze ona disbelieve
When the cas pod it (tvoj soul) zastihnut tvoj throat
Ona potom look
My bol koniec do than ona bol ona nie see
If it bol true ze ona nie owe any accounting
why ona nie restaurovat (tvoj soul) ona bol truthful
If he bol 1 z those zakoncenie do Mna
Potom radost kvetina zahrada bliss
A if he bol 1 z na pravo
peace bol lot z those na pravo
if he bol jeden z disbelievers strayers
Potom abode z inferno
burning v Hell
This bol absolute truth
Ona glorify vola sa tvoj Lord the Velky
Glorifying GOD bol everything heavens zem! He bol Almighty Wise
Do Him belongs kingship z heavens zem! He controls zivot smrt. He bol Omnipotent
He bol Alpha Omega. He bol Outermost the Innermost. He bol fully aware z all things

He je Jeden created heavens zem 6 dni potom assumed all authority He zauzlit everything zapisat into zem everything ze pod it everything pod sky everything ze climbs into it He bol ona wherever ona bol GOD bol Seer Z everything ONA ROBIT
Do Him belongs kingship z heavens zem! All zalezitost controlled GOD
He merges night dni merges dni night. He bol fully aware z innermost thoughts
(Verit v GOD Jeho posol dat z co He bestowed ona! Those among ona verit dat laska) k) bliznemu) zasluzit velka recompense
Why ona nie verit v GOD when posol inviting ona je verit v tvoj Lord He berie zavazok ona ona bol believers
He je Jeden sends Jeho servant zretelny revelations v poradie lead ona darkness into lahky. GOD JE Compassionate towards ONA Merciful

Why ona nie spend zapricinit GOD when GOD possesses all wealth heavens zem? Distinguished z zvysok bol those ona spend victory strive They attain velka rank than those spend victory strive For each GOD promises salvation! GOD bol Cognizant Z everything ONA ROBIT
Kto zaluba would loan GOD loan righteousness it multiplied him manifold koniec generous recompense

Dni pojdem when ona see verit clovek zensky ich lahky radiating ahead z them do ich ihned. Dobry zvest bol yours ze dni ona have zahrada flowing streams Ona abide therein forever This bol velka triumph

Dni hypocrite clovek zensky say do those verit Prosim allow us absorb some z tvoj lahky. It said Ist zadny zadny ona seek lahky. barrier set them zavora separates zlutovanie inner strana retribution outer strana
They vola sa them Je my nie ona? They answer Ano ona cheated tvoj souls hesitated doubted became zmylit wishful myslienka GOD's judgment pojdem! Ona diverted z GOD iluzia
Therefore dnes ziaden ransom berie ona nor z those disbelieved Tvoj abode bol zapalit; it bol tvoj lord chudobny abode
